title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. When I launch the Help view on Win2K using 20020326, the tab key does not do anything.
OB: When the Help view is launched, the tab key does not have any effect on Win2K (20020326). The user must click on one of the 'live' areas for the functionality to start working.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Win2K using version 20020326.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key.
3. Observe that the tab key does not have any effect.
4. Click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
5. Verify that after clicking on a 'live' area, the tab key works as expected.
